name: Sarah Chen
bio: Former intelligence analyst with 12 years at DIA. Focused on AI/ML applications in threat detection and cross-agency data sharing initiatives.

name: Marcus Johnson
bio: Senior software architect specializing in secure data infrastructure. Building bridges between commercial tech and government mission requirements.

name: Emily Rodriguez
bio: 15-year Army logistics officer. Now helping AWS Public Sector understand military supply chain challenges and cloud adoption barriers.

bio: Cybersecurity policy lead focused on critical infrastructure protection. Bringing government perspective to commercial threat intelligence.

bio: Former Marine Corps intelligence officer with deployments to CENTCOM. Translating operational experience into strategic consulting.

name: Robert Kim
bio: Cloud security engineer helping DOE modernize legacy systems while maintaining compliance with nuclear security requirements.

bio: Counterintelligence specialist exploring how commercial threat intelligence can enhance bureau operations and information sharing.

name: Michael Torres
bio: Former Navy SEAL with expertise in special operations planning. Now focused on defense innovation and rapid capability development.

name: Rachel Adams
bio: Foreign service officer specializing in technology diplomacy. Bridging the gap between tech platform policy and national security interests.

name: Christopher Lee
bio: Defense tech entrepreneur exploring how emerging technologies can accelerate government R&D timelines and acquisition processes.
